name: Quick Chicken Bites
description: Whether you’re hosting a laid-back get-together, a kid’s birthday party, or a fancy soirée, these little nuggets are an awesome, crowd-pleasing appy. Got surprise guests at your door? These are a breeze to whip up in your air fryer in no time at all!
preparation: Cut chicken breast into 1 1⁄2" chunks; toss in a bowl with mayonnaise to coat.
Place coating mix in a shallow dish. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken one chunk at a time, rotating and pressing to coat.
Place in air fryer basket and cook 10 min, or until golden brown and cooked through, turning halfway.
tips: Serve with Creamy Ranch Dip or Honey Mustard for dipping.
Trick your picky eaters into enjoying something healthier by cutting chicken breast into their favourite fast food nugget shapes before coating and cooking.

Don't have an air fryer? Place two Cooling Racks on a Sheet Pan; lightly brush with oil to prevent sticking. Place chicken on racks in a single layer. Bake in a preheated oven at 425° F for 15 min, or until chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165° F.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Honey Mustard
summary: A bold twist on a classic condiment made with 100% Canadian mustard seed and organic honey.

products.name: Cooling Rack (Set of 2)
summary: These space-saving cooling racks are an absolute must-have for every at-home baker or chef.
